title: Good Omen for Both
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Alright, it’s finally the day of our live concert. We already thoroughly prepared, and I stretched before sleeping last night. Okay, time for a nap!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>...It’s rare to see you nap before a concert, Ai. Especially right before one...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Well, that’s what you said last time! I’m improving myself! If I don’t get enough sleep, it’ll affect my performance, especially if I’m not asleep during Cinderella time!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I’m glad you remembered what I said.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>I remember everything you’ve said, though.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ai have a great memory~ Come on, let’s take a nap before the live!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Really...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>We have to get in the right spirit and nap! Just remember to whisper!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Hmm, maybe this will bring in a good omen for us.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
